originalTitle: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
title: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
content: Following an investigation some of the 16 detained last year are accused of planning to unseat President Bola Tinubu.

originalTitle: Kenyan cult leader faces charges over 52 further deaths
title: Kenyan cult leader faces charges over 52 further deaths
content: Prosecutors say Paul Mackenzie lured the latest victims to their deaths by writing notes from his prison cell.

originalTitle: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
title: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
content: The UN mission says it is gravely concerned by "inflammatory rhetoric calling for violence against civilians".

originalTitle: Trump says he is raising tariffs on South Korea to 25%
title: Trump says he is raising tariffs on South Korea to 25%
content: US president says he is raising tariff from 15 percent due to Seoul's failure to ratify trade deal.

originalTitle: Canadian PM Carney unveils multibillion-dollar push to lower food costs
title: Canadian PM Carney unveils multibillion-dollar push to lower food costs
content: Carney has been under pressure from the opposition to lower prices of food and other essentials for lower income people.

originalTitle: Minnesota, ICE and the makings of a US civil war
title: Minnesota, ICE and the makings of a US civil war
content: A 2024 simulation found US civil war could be triggered by clashes between state and federal law enforcement.

originalTitle: 'We're all terrified', Minnesotan tells the BBC in tears
title: 'We're all terrified', Minnesotan tells the BBC in tears
content: The BBC's Ana Faguy speaks to residents in the state after the second fatal shooting by federal immigration officers.

originalTitle: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
title: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called Ran Gvili’s return "an extraordinary achievement".

originalTitle: Deadly US winter storm leaves flights delayed and thousands without power
title: Deadly US winter storm leaves flights delayed and thousands without power
content: At least a dozen people have died in multiple US states possibly due to the storm, officials have said.

originalTitle: Bayern Munich open talks to extend Kane contract
title: Bayern Munich open talks to extend Kane contract
content: Bayern Munich sporting director Max Eberl says the German club are in talks with Harry Kane about extending the striker's contract.

originalTitle: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
title: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
content: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?

originalTitle: Besiktas pay £11m for Abraham - to sell him to Villa
title: Besiktas pay £11m for Abraham - to sell him to Villa
content: Besiktas pay £11.2m to Roma for Tammy Abraham - as the Turkish club prepare to sell him to Aston Villa.
